haxe.Serializer

type
class

Static Variables

private BASE64 : String

public USE_CACHE : Bool

If the values you are serializing can contain circular references or objects repetitions, you should set USE_CACHE to true to prevent infinite loops.

public USE_ENUM_INDEX : Bool

Use constructor indexes for enums instead of names. This is less reliable but more compact.

public run(v : Dynamic) : String

Serialize a single value and return the string.
